Text: that's the first movie I cant open and I tried quicktime, windows media player and divx....I have all possible and imaginable codecs installed so what kind of codecs do you need to play this ??? With divx there's video but its frozen and no sound....with windows media player there is sound but no video....help me ???
Are you sure you have absolutely everything? Try VLC media player.. it's free and plays almost everything

markalot84, use k-lite codec pack and BsPlayer.
With this you see everything.
